column3: Latest;Kampot: A foreigner died in a rented room caused shock at 7:10 am on September 30
column6: Kampot City.------An examination by police concluded American Robert Cox
column8: had died of a heart attack.------Friends of Robert contacted CNE yesterday morning and said he died after complaining of feeling unwell
column9: and asked for the news to be held until family had been contacted.------They also said that Robert was ex-military
column10: an accomplished author and short film director
column11: and well known and liked in the Kampot community. His death has come as a shock to those who knew him.
